affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 去动词化的抽象名词后缀, 通常表示"某种行为或结果"

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指某一部分人集中的居住区。
泛指各种居住住所，一般指暂时下榻之地。
多用于英国、澳大利亚和新西兰。指同一层建筑物上组成一个居住单元的几个房间。
通常指占用或居住时间较长的成套房间，在美国比较常用。
可泛指任何设备完善的一套房间，但多指包括起居室、卧室和浴室的陈设较豪华的套间。
常用lodgins,指临时租借的房间或宿舍。

bilingual.source: I live in an apartment across the street.
bilingual.target: 我住在街对面的公寓里。

bilingual.source: An apartment was completely submerged by the flood.
bilingual.target: 一间公寓被洪水完全淹没了。

bilingual.source: There's not enough room to swing a cat in my small apartment.
bilingual.target: 我的公寓太小了，连转身的空间都没有。

bilingual.source: Even though there was no garden in the apartment, there was a balcony.
bilingual.target: 尽管公寓里没有花园，但有一个阳台。

bilingual.source: And my apartment will be no good for pets because it'll be too small.
bilingual.target: 我的公寓不适合养宠物，因为它太小了。

bilingual.source: Tony would like to invite Hugo to his apartment to celebrate Thanksgiving.
bilingual.target: 托尼想邀请雨果去他的公寓庆祝感恩节。

bilingual.source: There's not enough room to swing a cat in my small apartment, so I don't cook very often.
bilingual.target: 我的公寓太小了，连转身的空间都没有，所以我不常做饭。

list.abstract: apartment（英[əˈpɑːtmənt]，美[əˈpɑːrtmənt]），英语单词，名词，释义为公寓套房; 一套公寓房间；一套公寓。短语搭配有apartment building（公寓大楼）。例句为“We followed Miss Temple to her apartment.（我们跟着坦普尔小姐来到她的公寓）”。 apartment相关近义词有chamber、flat。

yingyinNormal.en: I, need you to go to Will's apartment.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我需要你去趟威尔的公寓。

yingyinNormal.en: You know, I got some candles in my apartment.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我公寓里有些蜡烛。

yingyinNormal.en: King of apartment 26! Long live me!
yingyinNormal.zh: 26号公寓的国王！祝我万岁！

yingyinNormal.en: Hey. Hey Ross. Any word on the apartment yet?
yingyinNormal.zh: 罗斯，公寓申请得怎样？

yingyinNormal.en: Forget it. Okay, I'm not giving up the apartment.
yingyinNormal.zh: 别想了，我绝不让出那层公寓。

yingyinNormal.en: What were you doing with rocket fuel in your apartment?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你公寓里放火箭燃料干嘛？

yingyinNormal.en: You're never leaving the apartment. Say what?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你永远都不能离开这间公寓了。什么？

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, Max. How would you describe our apartment?
yingyinNormal.zh: 麦克斯，你会怎么描述我们的公寓？

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, my God. This is bigger than my first apartment.
yingyinNormal.zh: 天啊，这比我的第一个公寓还大。

yingyinNormal.en: Why is there a Cuban family living in your apartment?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你公寓里为什么住着一家古巴人？

yingyinNormal.en: It's Finn Polmar coming out of your wife's apartment building.
yingyinNormal.zh: 芬恩·波尔马，正从你妻子的公寓大楼走出来。

yingyinNormal.en: After the trial. Peter, it's a formality. The apartment's mine.
yingyinNormal.zh: 庭审后。彼得，这只是手续，这间公寓是我的。

yingyinNormal.en: And, and then I got, these are apartment pants. Apartment pants? Yeah, you never heard of them?
yingyinNormal.zh: 还买了这条公寓裤。公寓裤？对，你没听过吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Why don't you come with me. I'll walk you to the apartment.
yingyinNormal.zh: 跟我来吧，我带你去他公寓。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm sorry that I lied about my apartment. It's all right.
yingyinNormal.zh: 抱歉，我为公寓的事骗了你。没关系。

yingyinNormal.en: What about when I said, you know about the apartment pants, how dumb was I?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我那个公寓裤呢？够蠢吧？

yingyinNormal.en: Can we drop this? I am not interested in the guy's apartment.
yingyinNormal.zh: 别说了，好吗？我对那家伙的公寓没兴趣。

yingyinNormal.en: You can't stay in your apartment for the rest of your life.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对啊，你不能窝在公寓里，就此度过余生吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, you can't stay with me. I have a teeny-tiny apartment.
yingyinNormal.zh: 呃...你不能住我那儿，我的公寓小得可怜。

yingyinNormal.en: It's not important. The point is, the guys and I went back to the apartment.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那并不重要，重点是我们仨回到了公寓。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a set of rooms for living in, especially on one floor of a building

examination_example.sentence: Suppose you are going to study abroad and share an <highlight>apartment</highlight> with John, a local student.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 假设你要出国留学，和当地的学生约翰合租一套公寓。

examination_example.sentence: The researchers mapped not only the city's vast and ornate ceremonial areas, but also hundreds of simpler <highlight>apartment</highlight> complexes where common people lived.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究人员不仅测绘出了这座城市广阔、华丽的仪式区域，还测绘出了几百处普通人居住的较为简单的公寓楼。

sense_info_list.en: a room in a house, especially a large or famous house

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a set of rooms rented as a home

examination_example.sentence: A visitor will find rich people living in <highlight>apartments</highlight> or Spanish houses at the seaside or in the countryside.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 游客会发现富人住在海边或乡下的公寓或西班牙式住宅里。

examination_example.sentence: And if you live in an <highlight>apartment</highlight> building, removing your noisy shoes is the polite thing to do.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你住在公寓楼里，脱掉发出噪音的鞋子才是礼貌的做法。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 泛指各种居住住所, 一般指暂时下榻之地。
通常指占用或居住时间较长的成套房间, 在美国比较常用。
多用于英国、澳大利亚和新西兰。指同一层建筑物上组成一个居住单元的几个房间。
常用 lodgins, 指临时租借的房间或宿舍。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a set of rooms rented as a home

examination_example.sentence: It contained money from her <highlight>apartment</highlight> sale, already planned for a down payment on a new home.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这里有她出售公寓所得的钱，她已经计划用这些钱来支付新房子的首付。

examination_example.sentence: Do you mind describing the chairs that were delivered to your <highlight>apartment</highlight>, Mr. Brown?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 布朗先生，您方便描述一下给您送过来的椅子是什么样吗？
